definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Her child burnt to death in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子在火灾中烧死了。

sentences.english: They tied him up to a pole and burned him alive in 1415.
sentences.chinese: 1415年胡斯被绑在柱子上活活烧死。

sentences.english: Official statistics indicate 13 civilians were burned or stabbed to death.
sentences.chinese: 据官方统计，13名平民被烧死或刺死。

sentences.english: The two heretics were burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 两名异教徒被捆在木桩上烧死了。

sentences.english: Does he mean burn in hell?
sentences.chinese: 是指在地狱里被烧死吗？

sentences.english: Many people were burnt alive in the conflagration that happened in a multi-storeyed building.
sentences.chinese: 在一幢多层大厦内发生的大火中，很多人被活活烧死。

sentences.english: Sometimes, it merely nibbles a few leaves; sometimes it kills grown trees.
sentences.chinese: 它有时仅仅咬掉几片叶子，有时却烧死长成的大树。

sentences.english: Perhaps naively, I had expected to find that many trees had been killed.
sentences.chinese: 或许是天真吧，我曾认为会发现很多已被烧死的树。

sentences.english: Many, who could not escape, were trapped and burned to death.
sentences.chinese: 许多鸟没法逃走，陷于火宅而烧死了。

sentences.english: There'll be an explosion, and we'll be burned alive.
sentences.chinese: 会发生爆炸，而我们会被活活烧死。

sentences.english: One hundred and twenty burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 一百二十人绑在木桩上被烧死。

sentences.english: Seven days of Hera out of envy and burned close Li.
sentences.chinese: 天后赫拉出于嫉妒烧死塞密莉。

sentences.english: She would not say a word even though the enemy threatened to burn her.
sentences.chinese: 尽管敌人威胁要烧死她，但她依然只字未说。

sentences.english: You choose how to burn down your opponents with this powerful, 60-card, all-foil deck.
sentences.chinese: 你选择怎样用这强力的60张全闪套牌烧死你的对手。

sentences.english: The next day, and were tied to a post by the Japanese, burned alive.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，牛二被日本人绑在柱子上，活活烧死。

sentences.english: They are scorching the high school band with a flamethrower until they burn to death in Postal.
sentences.chinese: 还会在《邮差》中用喷火器将学校乐队的成员烧死。

definition: to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to set on fire/to commit arson/to create a disturbance
to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to burn down/to destroy with fire/trad. also written 焚毀
to burn down/to destroy with fire
an execution/to put sb to death
